scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set ($article = false) #set ($selectedArticleType = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('selectedArticleType', 'article')) #set ($titleVisible = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('titleVisible', true)) #set ($iconVisible = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('iconVisible', 'article')) #set ($roundIcon = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('roundIcon', false)) #set ($category = false) #set ($category = $articles_v1_categories.Current) ## Specific or current article #if ($selectedArticleType == 'article') #set ($emptyArticleId = $core_v2_utility.ParseGuid('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) #set ($selectedArticleQuery = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue("selectedArticle", ""))) #set ($selectedArticleId = $core_v2_utility.ParseGuid($selectedArticleQuery.Value('Article'))) ## Current article #if ($selectedArticleId == $emptyArticleId) #set($article = $articles_v1_articles.Current) ## Specific article #else #set($article = $articles_v1_articles.Get("%{ Id = $selectedArticleId }")) #end ## Current collection's default article #elseif ($selectedArticleType == 'collection') #set($collection = $articles_v1_articleCollections.Current) #if (!$collection) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set ($article = $collection.DefaultArticle) ## Current cagegory's default article #elseif ($selectedArticleType == 'category') #set($category = $articles_v1_categories.Current) #if (!$category) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set ($article = $category.DefaultArticle) #end #if (!$article) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end $articles_v1_articles.IncrementViewCount($article.ContentId) #set ($iconUrl = false) #set ($iconAlt = false) #if ($iconVisible == 'article' && $article.Type && $article.Type.ImageUrl) #set ($iconUrl = $article.Type.ImageUrl) #set ($iconAlt = $article.Type.Name) #elseif ($iconVisible == 'category' && $category && $category.ImageUrl) #set ($iconUrl = $category.ImageUrl) #set ($iconAlt = $category.Name) #end
#if ($titleVisible)

#if ($iconUrl) $core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($iconUrl, 32, 32, "%{ResizeMethod = 'ZoomAndCrop', border='0px', alt='$iconAlt' }") #end $article.Title

#end
$article.Body()
